text:
Salah Abdulla Nooruddin Nooruddin (Arabic: صلاح عبد الله نور الدين نور الدين‎; born 1963) is a significant Bahraini Businessman and entrepreneur. He is the current CEO of Envest Limited.
Nooruddin is also the former chairman of Leeds United A.F.C.. In 2014 Nooruddin was removed as club chairman by the new owner of Leeds United A.F.C. He remained as a member of board of directors until April 2014 when he resigned from the board.
